SEARCH
Package cop4331.client

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
cop4331.client.Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Product>
public class Inventory extends Object implements Iterable<Product>
Represents an inventory of products, allowing for management of product lists and notification of changes to observers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Inventory()
    Constructs an empty Inventory with no products or observers.

      Sets the list of products in the inventory and notifies all observers of the change.

    • addProduct

      Adds a product to the inventory and notifies all observers of the change.
      Parameters:

    • removeProduct

      Removes a product from the inventory and notifies all observers of the change.
      Parameters:

    • findProductById

      public Product findProductById(String productId)
      Finds a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to find.
      Returns:
      the product with the matching ID, or null if not found.

    • updateProduct

      Updates an existing product in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      updatedProduct - the product with updated information.

      Returns:

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Observer<Inventory> observer)
      Adds an observer to the inventory. Observers are notified whenever the inventory changes.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to add.

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(Observer<Inventory> observer)
      Removes an observer from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to remove.

      public void notifyObservers()
      Notifies all observers of a change to the inventory.
